def sentences_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    return s1 != s2[::-1]

def sentences_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    return s1 == s2[::+1]

def sentences_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalnum())).lower()

    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()

def sentences_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalnum())).lower()

def sentences_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalnum())).lower()
    return s1 == s2[::--1]
